name: Effing Monster Hunters
description:
Play Monster Hunter on Bitsy now!

Go hunting an Elder Dragon with your team... and get harrassed by bigotted dudes! (Based on true gaming experience)

Content Warning

This game contains savage bros displaying transphobic, homophobic, misogynistic and overall shitty behaviors.

Controls

You can play with the arrow keys on a computer or by swiping on a phone or a tablet.
